Codepedia!

While learning different languages and topics, I created a codepedia to help document terms, procedures, and other topics organized by language or framework. Check it out!

The Story

I started Code Away With Me to be a site where I could solidify my own understanding of different web design, development, and coding concepts. From it grew this blog where I teach others what I know, what I'm learning, and how I'm making myself more techy every day.

Who Am I?

I'm a momma of 2 beautiful, sweet girls. I'm a runner, a rock climber, a military spouse. I love programming and web development, but found it difficult to get a stable career not being open to relocation. Here's my story, where I've been, who I am, and where I'm going.

Want to hire me?

In addition to my blog I do some freelance work as well. Check out my portfolio for an idea of what I can do for you!

More to Learn

One of my favorite things about tech is all of the free resources from people (like me!) who just want to help make the tech world a better, more accessible place.
